Class Cylinder

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.Tube
geometries.Cylinder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
public class Cylinder
extends Tube
Cylinder class representing a three-dimensional cylinder in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
Author:
Aviel Buta and Yakir Yohanan
